<Text: So You Think You Can Dance, a televised American dance competition, began broadcast of its tenth season on May 14, 2013.>

Text: So You Think You Can Dance (U.S. season 10):  It airs on the FOX Television Network and was hosted by Cat Deeley and featured returning permanent judges Nigel Lythgoe, who also serves as one of the show's executive producers, and Mary Murphy.

Text: So You Think You Can Dance (U.S. season 10):  It was also the first season in the show's history that a tap dancer not only made it past the third week of competition, but made the finale.
